SELECT pv.acreedor_codigo_sap AS codigo_sap, pv.ruc, pv.razon_social, linea.descripcion AS linea, familia.descripcion AS familia, subfamilia.descripcion AS subfamilia, plc.otros_linea_comercial FROM PROVEEDOR_LINEA_COMERCIAL plc INNER JOIN PROVEEDOR pv ON plc.id_proveedor = pv.id_proveedor INNER JOIN LINEA_COMERCIAL linea ON plc.id_linea_comercial = linea.id_linea_comercial INNER JOIN LINEA_COMERCIAL familia ON plc.id_familia = familia.id_linea_comercial INNER JOIN LINEA_COMERCIAL subfamilia ON plc.id_subfamilia = subfamilia.id_linea_comercial ORDER BY pv.razon_social;
